actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 94-767.

official_title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Select Committee to study governmental operations with respect to intelligence activities.

summary.text: Increases the expenditure to $515,000 (presently $450,000) by the Senate Select Committee to Study Governmental Operations With Respect to Intelligence Activities for an inquiry and investigation relating to intelligence activities carried out by the Federal Government.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Select Committee to study governmental operations with respect to intelligence activities.
